title: Elton John - Wonderful Crazy Night Tour 2017
author: Alex
content:
Pop icon Elton John announces Blackburn show at Ewood Park on 10th June 2017. His first ever show in Blackburn.

 

TICKETS ON SALE FRIDAY 23RD SEPTEMBER AT 10AM

 

2016 has been a vintage year for Elton John; he released his 33rd studio album Wonderful Crazy Night to rapturous applause, and wowed audiences across the UK with his epic live show, which culminated in a headline performance at Hyde Park in London for BBC Radio 2. Last weekend he also performed at the annual Apple Music Festival.

 

It was no different at the Lincolnshire Showground, where The Lincolnshire Echo simply declared, “when Sir Elton John came to Lincoln, Lincoln had one wonderful, crazy night”. In Liverpool, the Echo observed, “every song was note perfect, packed with the kind of energy that belies his years”

title: Lionel Richie - All The Hits
author: Jordan
content:
As part of Yasalam 2016, Lionel Richie will be bringing All The Hits to Abu Dhabi’s Yas Marina Circuit for the Saturday F1 after-race concert on the 26th November.

 

Tickets are on sale now and available for purchase here.

title: Elton John - Wonderful Crazy Night Tour 2016
author: Newsdesk
content:
Concert-goers with tickets to see Elton John and his band performing outdoors this summer are encouraged to explore our information guides, filled with useful tips and details to ensure you have the best possible experience on the day of the concert.

 

The guides also include maps of the local vicinity to each venue enabling you to plan your routes to and from the stadiums and details on where to park if travelling by car.

 

A seating plan is included to help you locate your seat, and information includes what you can and cannot bring into each venue.

 

LINCOLNCSHIRE SHOW GROUND, LINCOLN - FRIDAY 10 JUNE

title: Paul McCartney - One On One
author: Alex
content:
Due to incredible demand for tickets to his October 4 opening show at the Golden 1 Center, Paul McCartney has added a second performance on Wednesday, October 5. The October 5 show will be Paul’s only additional appearance in the area on his new One on One tour.

 

“What an amazing response to an historic event for Sacramento,” said Kings President Chris Granger. “We’re honored to have Paul play back-to-back shows and launch Golden 1 Center in true rock and roll fashion.”

 

At this time, all pre-sales for the first show on Tuesday, October 4 have been exhausted. General public tickets for show one will open at 10 a.m. on Friday, May 6. Show two will also go on sale at 10 a.m. on Friday, May 6. 

 

PAUL McCARTNEY

ONE ON ONE
North American Dates 2016

 

May 5 -- Minneapolis, MN -- Target Center
July 8 -- Milwaukee, WI -- SummerFest
July 10 -- Cincinnati, OH -- US Bank Arena
July 12 -- Philadelphia, PA -- Citizens Bank Park
July 17 – Boston, MA — Fenway Park
July 19 -- Hershey, PA -- Hersheypark Stadium
July 21 -- Hamilton, ONT -- FirstOntario Centre
August 7 -- East Rutherford, NJ -- MetLife Stadium
August 9 – Washington D.C. – Verizon Center
August 10 – Washington D.C. – Verizon Center
August 13 -- St. Louis, MO -- Busch Stadium
August 15 – Grand Rapids, MI — Van Andel Arena
August 17 – Cleveland, OH – Quicken Loans Arena
August 18 – Cleveland, OH – Quicken Loans Arena
October 4 -- Sacramento, CA -- Golden 1 Center
October 5 -- Sacramento, CA -- Golden 1 Center
October 8 — Indio, CA — Desert Trip

title: Lionel Richie - Live in Europe - Summer 2015
author: Alex
content:
As he begins his Las Vegas All The Hits residency, Lionel Richie sat down with Ross King for Good Morning Britain at The Axis at Planet Hollywood to talk about his tour and legacy as a musician. Watch the video below.

 

See Lionel across the UK on his All The Hits tour, beginning at the Eden Project on June 14th. Tickets and details here.
